data.actual_result: You can't join the voice channel as Discord acts like you are still in the channel you were moved from.
data.expected_result: Should allow you to join the channel you were moved from.
data.short_description: After being moved Discord acts as if you are still in the channel you were moved from.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel. - Have someone move you. - Try to join the channel you were moved from.
